abstract: The former governor of New Jersey agreed on Tuesday to become the chairman and chief executive of MF Global, a brokerage firm, and an operating partner at J.C. Flowers & Company, a private equity firm specializing in financial services companies.
snippet: The former governor of New Jersey agreed on Tuesday to become the chairman and chief executive of MF Global, a brokerage firm, and an operating partner at J.C. Flowers & Company, a private equity firm specializing in financial services companies.
lead_paragraph: 8:43 p.m. | Updated The New York Times’s Nelson D. Schwartz has more here.

headline.main: MF Global Brings Corzine Back to Wall Street
